column2: Your nefarious foe has unleashed their evil magics upon you, do you wish to attempt to dispel their magic?.
Curses, [event_target:magic_dispeler.GetBestName] has attempted to stop your spell!.
Curses, Your enemy, the evil [event_target:magic_caster.GetBestName] has engaged you in a deeper contest of power.
The battle of minds continues, surely [event_target:magic_dispeler.GetBestName] must be growing weak by now, do you wish to continue the battle.
